This page contains the download links to many of the spatial layers and mapping products that were generated for the Bowen Biodiversity Plan. The intention is to provide these spatial products in a central location, as transparently as possible, to faciliate further study and decision-making for Bowen Island's biodiversity. 

## Species 
### Total Species Richness
This describes the sum of species presence per 100 m resolution cell on Bowen Island, based on species distribution models.  

**Last Updated:**

July 16 2025

**Download:** 

[PNG](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1n-lkO8Ed5-M-5EgR4G_TCEYFEjnuSgNg/view?usp=drive_link){.btn .btn-outline-primary .btn role="button"} [TIF](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1SxNMvh3u8U9hxkPgbOSVHqlve7DRYpWc/view?usp=drive_link){.btn .btn-outline-primary .btn role="button"} 

### Total Species Diversity
This describes the sum of probability of occurence across available species distribution models per 100 m resolution cell on Bowen Island. 

**Last Updated:**

July 16 2025

**Download:** 

[PNG](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Vzg2_Cf6f8vO0T6b2-BXpj1jQrotNE5-/view?usp=drive_link){.btn .btn-outline-primary .btn role="button"} [TIF](https://drive.google.com/file/d/179Ly9BqGHXid_ZPgC3ChUifGOD2EQnQr/view?usp=drive_link){.btn .btn-outline-primary .btn role="button"} 

### Threatened Species Richness
This describes the sum of species presence per 100 m resolution cell on Bowen Island, based on species distribution models. Includes only Threatened species. 

**Last Updated:**

July 16 2025
